class.name: cloud_proc/box_filter
class.description: Box filter nodelet keeps points with the field value within an interval.

class.name: cloud_proc/projection
class.description: Projection nodelet rearranges points based on their spherical projection. Only one point in each pixel is kept.

class.name: cloud_proc/range_filter
class.description: Range filter nodelet keeps points in a range interval.

class.name: cloud_proc/voxel_filter
class.description: Voxel filter nodelet keeps only one point from each voxel.
